corresponding_assay: ELISA (secreted VEGF); endothelial tube formation (conditioned media)
metric_used: pg/mL VEGF; tube length / branch points
rationale_for_deterrence: Enhances angiogenesis around follicles, improving nutrient/oxygen supply
TGF-β1 drives catagen and apoptosis; suppression prolongs growth phase
Reduces DHT-driven follicle miniaturization in androgenic alopecia
Promotes epithelial–mesenchymal crosstalk and follicle regeneration
